newsitem.title: EGYPT: Arafat arrives in Egypt for talks with Mubarak.
newsitem.headline: Arafat arrives in Egypt for talks with Mubarak.

text.p: Palestinian President Yasser Arafat arrived in Cairo on Saturday for talks with Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak expected to focus on Israel's decision to build a Jewish settlement on an Arab East Jerusalem hilltop.
Airport sources reported Arafat's arrival in the Egyptian capital, where the two leaders regularly consult on the Middle East peace process.
Palestinian aides have said the Jewish state's plan was expected to top the agenda in Cairo and also Arafat's talks in Washington with U.S. President Bill Clinton on Monday.
Arafat on Thursday attacked the plan to build the 6,500 homes as a breach of peace agreements.
Israel captured East Jerusalem in the 1967 Middle East war and views all of the city as its capital. Palestinians see Arab East Jerusalem as the capital of a future Palestinian state.
